trans-unit.source: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (PHP) - Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS (PHP) - Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in PHP.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure. Code samples written in PHP.

trans-unit.source: 如何为语音和短信功能在 PHP 中的使用应答
trans-unit.target: 如何为语音和短信功能在 PHP 中的使用应答

trans-unit.source: 本指南说明如何执行常见的编程任务，与应答 API 服务在 Azure 上。所包含的方案包括打电话和发送短消息服务 (SMS) 消息。应答和在应用程序中使用语音和短信的详细信息，请参阅 <link><linkText>接下来的步骤</linkText><title></title></link> 第一节。
trans-unit.target: 本指南说明如何执行常见的编程任务，与应答 API 服务在 Azure 上。所包含的方案包括打电话和发送短消息服务 (SMS) 消息。应答和在应用程序中使用语音和短信的详细信息，请参阅 <link><linkText>接下来的步骤</linkText><title></title></link> 第一节。

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>应答是什么?
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>应答是什么?

trans-unit.source: 应答业务通信，使开发人员能够将嵌入的声音、 VoIP 和消息传递到应用程序的未来提供了动力。他们虚拟化在云为基础的全球环境中，公开通过应答通信 API 平台所需的所有基础设施。应用程序是简单打造和可扩展。享受与薪酬作为您的灵活性去定价，并受益于云计算的可靠性。
trans-unit.target: 应答业务通信，使开发人员能够将嵌入的声音、 VoIP 和消息传递到应用程序的未来提供了动力。他们虚拟化在云为基础的全球环境中，公开通过应答通信 API 平台所需的所有基础设施。应用程序是简单打造和可扩展。享受与薪酬作为您的灵活性去定价，并受益于云计算的可靠性。

trans-unit.source: 应答的声音 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收电话。 短信应答 使您的应用程序发送和接收文本消息。 应答客户端 允许您将 VoIP 呼叫从任何手机，平板电脑，或者浏览器和支持 WebRTC。
trans-unit.target: 应答的声音 允许您的应用程序来拨打和接收电话。 短信应答 使您的应用程序发送和接收文本消息。 应答客户端 允许您将 VoIP 呼叫从任何手机，平板电脑，或者浏览器和支持 WebRTC。

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>应答定价和特别优惠
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>应答定价和特别优惠

trans-unit.source: 蔚蓝的客户收到 <link><linkText>特价优惠</linkText><title></title></link>: 免费 $10 的应答信用当您升级应答帐户。此应答信用可以应用于任何应答用法 ($10 信贷相当于多达 1000 SMS 封邮件的发送或接收声音入站的达 1000年分钟，取决于您的电话号码和消息或呼叫目的地的位置)。赎回此应答信贷和由此开始: <link><linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: 蔚蓝的客户收到 <link><linkText>特价优惠</linkText><title></title></link>: 免费 $10 的应答信用当您升级应答帐户。此应答信用可以应用于任何应答用法 ($10 信贷相当于多达 1000 SMS 封邮件的发送或接收声音入站的达 1000年分钟，取决于您的电话号码和消息或呼叫目的地的位置)。赎回此应答信贷和由此开始: <link><linkText>http://ahoy.twilio.com/azure</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: 应答是现收现付的服务。有没有安装费，你可以在任何时候关闭您的帐户。你可以找到更多详情 <link><linkText>应答定价[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: 应答是现收现付的服务。有没有安装费，你可以在任何时候关闭您的帐户。你可以找到更多详情 <link><linkText>应答定价[twilio_pricing]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>概念
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>概念

trans-unit.source: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.
trans-unit.target: The Twilio API is a RESTful API that provides voice and SMS functionality for applications.

trans-unit.source: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <link><linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Client libraries are available in multiple languages; for a list, see <link><linkText>Twilio API Libraries[twilio_libraries]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Key aspects of the Twilio API are Twilio verbs and Twilio Markup Language (TwiML).
trans-unit.target: Key aspects of the Twilio API are Twilio verbs and Twilio Markup Language (TwiML).

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Twilio Verbs
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Twilio Verbs

trans-unit.source: The API makes use of Twilio verbs; for example, the verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.
trans-unit.target: The API makes use of Twilio verbs; for example, the verb instructs Twilio to audibly deliver a message on a call.

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of Twilio verbs.

trans-unit.source: Learn about the other verbs and capabilities via <link><linkText>Twilio Markup Language documentation</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the other verbs and capabilities via <link><linkText>Twilio Markup Language documentation</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: : Connects the caller to another phone.
trans-unit.target: : Connects the caller to another phone.

trans-unit.source: : Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.
trans-unit.target: : Collects numeric digits entered on the telephone keypad.

trans-unit.source: : Ends a call.
trans-unit.target: : Ends a call.

trans-unit.source: : Plays an audio file.
trans-unit.target: : Plays an audio file.

trans-unit.source: : Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.
trans-unit.target: : Waits silently for a specified number of seconds.

trans-unit.source: : Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.
trans-unit.target: : Records the caller's voice and returns a URL of a file that contains the recording.

trans-unit.source: : Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.
trans-unit.target: : Transfers control of a call or SMS to the TwiML at a different URL.

trans-unit.source: : Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you
trans-unit.target: : Rejects an incoming call to your Twilio number without billing you

trans-unit.source: : Converts text to speech that is made on a call.
trans-unit.target: : Converts text to speech that is made on a call.

trans-unit.source: : Sends an SMS message.
trans-unit.target: : Sends an SMS message.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>TwiML
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>TwiML

trans-unit.source: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions based on the Twilio verbs that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.
trans-unit.target: TwiML is a set of XML-based instructions based on the Twilio verbs that inform Twilio of how to process a call or SMS.

trans-unit.source: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text 世界您好 to speech.
trans-unit.target: As an example, the following TwiML would convert the text 世界您好 to speech.

trans-unit.source: When your application calls the Twilio API, one of the API parameters is the URL that returns the TwiML response.
trans-unit.target: When your application calls the Twilio API, one of the API parameters is the URL that returns the TwiML response.

trans-unit.source: For development purposes, you can use Twilio-provided URLs to provide the TwiML responses used by your applications.
trans-unit.target: For development purposes, you can use Twilio-provided URLs to provide the TwiML responses used by your applications.

trans-unit.source: You could also host your own URLs to produce the TwiML responses, and another option is to use the TwiMLResponse object.
trans-unit.target: You could also host your own URLs to produce the TwiML responses, and another option is to use the TwiMLResponse object.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <link><linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about Twilio verbs, their attributes, and TwiML, see <link><linkText>TwiML[twiml]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <link><linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about the Twilio API, see <link><linkText>Twilio API[twilio_api]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Create a Twilio Account
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Create a Twilio Account

trans-unit.source: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <link><linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: When you're ready to get a Twilio account, sign up at <link><linkText>Try Twilio[try_twilio]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.
trans-unit.target: You can start with a free account, and upgrade your account later.

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll receive an account ID and an authentication token.
trans-unit.target: When you sign up for a Twilio account, you'll receive an account ID and an authentication token.

trans-unit.source: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.
trans-unit.target: Both will be needed to make Twilio API calls.

trans-unit.source: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.
trans-unit.target: To prevent unauthorized access to your account, keep your authentication token secure.

trans-unit.source: Your account ID and authentication token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID 和 AUTH TOKEN, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Your account ID and authentication token are viewable at the Twilio account page[twilio_account], in the fields labeled ACCOUNT SID 和 AUTH TOKEN, respectively.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Create a PHP Application
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Create a PHP Application

trans-unit.source: A PHP application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other PHP application that uses the Twilio service.
trans-unit.target: A PHP application that uses the Twilio service and is running in Azure is no different than any other PHP application that uses the Twilio service.

trans-unit.source: While Twilio services are REST-based and can be called from PHP in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <link><linkText>Twilio library for PHP from GitHub[twilio_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: While Twilio services are REST-based and can be called from PHP in several ways, this article will focus on how to use Twilio services with <link><linkText>Twilio library for PHP from GitHub[twilio_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the Twilio library for PHP, see <link><linkText>http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/index.html[twilio_lib_docs]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about using the Twilio library for PHP, see <link><linkText>http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/index.html[twilio_lib_docs]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Detailed instructions for building and deploying a Twilio/PHP application to Azure are available at <link><linkText>如何使在 Azure 上的 PHP 应用程序中使用应答电话呼叫[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Detailed instructions for building and deploying a Twilio/PHP application to Azure are available at <link><linkText>如何使在 Azure 上的 PHP 应用程序中使用应答电话呼叫[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>Configure Your Application to Use Twilio Libraries
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>Configure Your Application to Use Twilio Libraries

trans-unit.source: You can configure your application to use the Twilio library for PHP in two ways:
trans-unit.target: You can configure your application to use the Twilio library for PHP in two ways:

trans-unit.source: Download the Twilio library for PHP from GitHub (https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php]) and add the Services directory to your application.
trans-unit.target: Download the Twilio library for PHP from GitHub (https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php[twilio_php]) and add the Services directory to your application.

trans-unit.source: -OR-
trans-unit.target: -OR-

trans-unit.source: Install the Twilio library for PHP as a PEAR package.
trans-unit.target: Install the Twilio library for PHP as a PEAR package.

trans-unit.source: It can be installed with the following commands:
trans-unit.target: It can be installed with the following commands:

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Twilio library for PHP, you can then add a require_once statement at the top of your PHP files to reference the library:
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Twilio library for PHP, you can then add a require_once statement at the top of your PHP files to reference the library:

trans-unit.source: 有关更多信息，请参见 <link><linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <link><linkText>https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md[twilio_github_readme]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Make an outgoing call
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Make an outgoing call

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to make an outgoing call using the Services_Twilio class.
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to make an outgoing call using the Services_Twilio class.

trans-unit.source: This code also uses a Twilio-provided site to return the Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response.
trans-unit.target: This code also uses a Twilio-provided site to return the Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response.

trans-unit.source: Substitute your values for the From 和 To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.
trans-unit.target: Substitute your values for the From 和 To phone numbers, and ensure that you verify the From phone number for your Twilio account prior to running the code.

trans-unit.source: As mentioned, this code uses a Twilio-provided site to return the TwiML response.
trans-unit.target: As mentioned, this code uses a Twilio-provided site to return the TwiML response.

trans-unit.source: You could instead use your own site to provide the TwiML response; for more information, see <link><linkText>How to Provide TwiML Responses from Your Own Web Site</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You could instead use your own site to provide the TwiML response; for more information, see <link><linkText>How to Provide TwiML Responses from Your Own Web Site</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Note: To troubleshoot SSL certificate validation errors, see http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/usage/rest.html[ssl_validation]
trans-unit.target: Note: To troubleshoot SSL certificate validation errors, see http://readthedocs.org/docs/twilio-php/en/latest/usage/rest.html[ssl_validation]

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Send an SMS message
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Send an SMS message

trans-unit.source: The following shows how to send an SMS message using the Services_Twilio class.
trans-unit.target: The following shows how to send an SMS message using the Services_Twilio class.

trans-unit.source: The From number is provided by Twilio for trial accounts to send SMS messages.
trans-unit.target: The From number is provided by Twilio for trial accounts to send SMS messages.

trans-unit.source: The To number must be verified for your Twilio account prior to running the code.
trans-unit.target: The To number must be verified for your Twilio account prior to running the code.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Provide TwiML Responses from your own Website
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Provide TwiML Responses from your own Website

trans-unit.source: When your application initiates a call to the Twilio API, Twilio will send your request to a URL that is expected to return a TwiML response. The example above uses the Twilio-provided URL http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]. (While TwiML is designed for use by Twilio, you can view the it in your browser. For example, click http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url] to see an empty element; as another example, click http://twimlets.com/message?Message%5B0%5D=Hello%20World[twimlet_message_url_hello_world] to see a element that contains a element.)
trans-unit.target: When your application initiates a call to the Twilio API, Twilio will send your request to a URL that is expected to return a TwiML response. The example above uses the Twilio-provided URL http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url]. (While TwiML is designed for use by Twilio, you can view the it in your browser. For example, click http://twimlets.com/message[twimlet_message_url] to see an empty element; as another example, click http://twimlets.com/message?Message%5B0%5D=Hello%20World[twimlet_message_url_hello_world] to see a element that contains a element.)

trans-unit.source: Instead of relying on the Twilio-provided URL, you can create your own site that returns HTTP responses.
trans-unit.target: Instead of relying on the Twilio-provided URL, you can create your own site that returns HTTP responses.

trans-unit.source: You can create the site in any language that returns XML responses; this topic assumes you'll be using PHP to create the TwiML.
trans-unit.target: You can create the site in any language that returns XML responses; this topic assumes you'll be using PHP to create the TwiML.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP page results in a TwiML response that says 世界您好 on the call.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP page results in a TwiML response that says 世界您好 on the call.

trans-unit.source: As you can see from the example above, the TwiML response is simply an XML document.
trans-unit.target: As you can see from the example above, the TwiML response is simply an XML document.

trans-unit.source: The Twilio library for PHP contains classes that will generate TwiML for you.
trans-unit.target: The Twilio library for PHP contains classes that will generate TwiML for you.

trans-unit.source: The example below produces the equivalent response as shown above, but uses the Services\_Twilio\_Twiml class in the Twilio library for PHP:
trans-unit.target: The example below produces the equivalent response as shown above, but uses the Services\_Twilio\_Twiml class in the Twilio library for PHP:

trans-unit.source: For more information about TwiML, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml_reference]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about TwiML, see <link><linkText>https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml[twiml_reference]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Once you have your PHP page set up to provide TwiML responses, use the URL of the PHP page as the URL passed into the Services_Twilio->account->calls->create method.
trans-unit.target: Once you have your PHP page set up to provide TwiML responses, use the URL of the PHP page as the URL passed into the Services_Twilio->account->calls->create method.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a Web application named MyTwiML deployed to an Azure hosted service, and the name of the PHP page is mytwiml.php, the URL can be passed to Services_Twilio->account->calls->create as shown in the following example:
trans-unit.target: For example, if you have a Web application named MyTwiML deployed to an Azure hosted service, and the name of the PHP page is mytwiml.php, the URL can be passed to Services_Twilio->account->calls->create as shown in the following example:

trans-unit.source: For additional information about using Twilio in Azure with PHP, see <link><linkText>如何使在 Azure 上的 PHP 应用程序中使用应答电话呼叫[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional information about using Twilio in Azure with PHP, see <link><linkText>如何使在 Azure 上的 PHP 应用程序中使用应答电话呼叫[howto_phonecall_php]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><html></html>How to: Use Additional Twilio Services
trans-unit.target: <html></html><html></html>How to: Use Additional Twilio Services

trans-unit.source: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.
trans-unit.target: In addition to the examples shown here, Twilio offers web-based APIs that you can use to leverage additional Twilio functionality from your Azure application.

trans-unit.source: For full details, see the <link><linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For full details, see the <link><linkText>Twilio API documentation[twilio_api_documentation]</linkText><title></title></link>.
